entity.name: One World: Together at Home
entity.description: Global Citizen presents One World: Together at Home, a global special curated in collaboration with Lady Gaga and featuring your favorite artists and comedians — all in support of the World Health Organization (WHO) and the health care workers on the frontlines of the COVID-19 crisis⁠.

entity.name: One World: Together at Home
entity.description: Global Citizen presents One World: Together at Home, a global special curated in collaboration with Lady Gaga and featuring your favorite artists and comedians — all in support of the World Health Organization (WHO) and the health care workers on the frontlines of the COVID-19 crisis⁠.

text: Paul will join @glblctzn and @WHO for One World: #TogetherAtHome — a one-night special event on Saturday 18th April – in support of healthcare workers on the frontlines of the #COVID19 crisis. Full details HERE: https://t.co/zet26gicFO https://t.co/4RxDu6njz4
